sentences.sentence: I not only good luck, beriberi is good too!
sentences.translation: 我不但手气好，脚气也不错！

sentences.sentence: My someone gas , Still there is the beriberi .
sentences.translation: 我这个人有人气，还有脚气。

sentences.sentence: You don’t hear much about the disease beriberi anymore.
sentences.translation: 您应该极少听说一种叫做 脚气病 （beriberi）的顽疾吧。 可为何如今患有这种病的人已经不多了呢？
